leg.name: leg
leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of spider-like chitin quickly grows over [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As [npc.her] new chitin spreads down to the ends of [npc.her] toes, it splits around the joints and gives them a segmented appearance, leaving [npc.him] with plantigrade, spider-like feet. This hard chitin then sprouts a fur-like layer of chitinous hairs, which quickly envelops [npc.her] entire legs. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new chitin plates sharply transition into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] plantigrade, [style.boldSpider(spider-like legs and feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: #IF(npc.getLegConfiguration()==LEG_CONFIGURATION_ARACHNID) [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and look identical to those of a feral spider, complete with seven segmented pieces and little claws in place of feet. #ELSE [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are covered small chitin plates splitting at the joints. #ENDIF
